function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using Euclidean distance in 2D space for inter-people distance estimation","Impact":"Erroneous distance measurement","Mitigation":"Apply a calibrated IPM transition to account for the reduced dimensionality","Technologies":"Calibrated IPM transition","People":"People using 2D inter-people distance estimation","Owner":"Camera calibration and imaging technology experts"},{"Description":"Lack of camera calibration and intrinsic parameters","Impact":"Inaccurate mapping of 2D pixel points to world coordinate points","Mitigation":"Perform camera calibration and determine intrinsic parameters","Technologies":"Camera calibration technology","People":"Camera calibration and imaging technology experts","Owner":"Camera calibration and imaging technology experts"},{"Description":"Error in camera height, angle of view, and optics specifications","Impact":"Inaccurate mapping of 2D pixel points to world coordinate points","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate measurement and input of camera height, angle of view, and optics specifications","Technologies":"Measurement tools for camera parameters","People":"Camera calibration and imaging technology experts","Owner":"Camera calibration and imaging technology experts"}]}
